verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh.
Their habitual winter and summer journeys.
Let them worship the Lord of this House.
Who fed them against hunger, and made them safe from fear.
